transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, Manik sir, main India Mart se bol raha hun.
Customer: India Mart se bol raha hun.
Executive: Sir, main karta hun aapko na ek ghante mein phone karta hun, aaj resolve kar dunga aapka.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- None



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer back in one hour and resolve the issue today.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call, india mart
